sentences.zh: 中宮天極星，其一明者，太一常居也；

translations.literal: Central palace celestial pole star, its one bright one, Taiyi constantly dwells also;
translations.idiomatic: The central palace's celestial pole star, the one bright one, is where Taiyi constantly dwells;

translations.literal: Beside three stars three dukes, or said child belongs.
translations.idiomatic: The three stars beside are the three dukes, or said to be the child attendants.

sentences.zh: 後句四星，末大星正妃，餘三星後宮之屬也。

translations.literal: Back bend four stars, final big star principal consort, remaining three stars rear palace attendants also.
translations.idiomatic: The four stars in the bend behind, the final big star is the principal consort, the remaining three stars are the rear palace attendants.

translations.literal: Surrounding protective guard twelve stars, feudal ministers.
translations.idiomatic: The twelve stars surrounding as protective guards are the feudal ministers.

translations.literal: All called purple palace.
translations.idiomatic: All are called the Purple Palace.

sentences.zh: 前列直斗口三星，隨北端兌，若見若不，曰陰德，或曰天一。

translations.literal: Front row straight dipper mouth three stars, follow north end joyful, as see as not, called yin virtue, or called heaven one.
translations.idiomatic: The three stars in the front row straight at the dipper mouth, following the north end's joyful appearance, sometimes visible sometimes not, are called Yin Virtue, or called Heaven One.

sentences.zh: 紫宮左三星曰天槍，右五星曰天棓，後六星絕漢抵營室，曰閣道。

translations.literal: Purple palace left three stars called heaven spear, right five stars called heaven mace, back six stars cross milky way reach camp room, called corridor way.
translations.idiomatic: To the left of the Purple Palace, three stars are called Heaven Spear; to the right, five stars are called Heaven Mace; behind, six stars crossing the Milky Way to reach the Camp Room are called the Corridor Way.

sentences.zh: 北斗七星，所謂「旋、璣、玉衡以齊七政」。

translations.literal: Northern dipper seven stars, so-called "revolve, ji, jade balance to align seven governments".
translations.idiomatic: The Northern Dipper's seven stars, what is called 'the revolving Ji and Jade Balance to align the seven governments.'

sentences.zh: 杓攜龍角，衡殷南斗，魁枕參首。

translations.literal: Dipper ladle carries dragon horn, balance faces south dipper, dipper head pillows shen head.
translations.idiomatic: The dipper ladle carries the dragon horn, the balance faces the southern dipper, the dipper head pillows on Shen's head.

translations.literal: Use dusk establish ones dipper ladle;
translations.idiomatic: Those who use dusk to establish are the dipper ladle;

translations.literal: Dipper ladle, from china southward west.
translations.idiomatic: The dipper ladle is from China southwestward.

translations.literal: Midnight establish ones balance;
translations.idiomatic: Those who use midnight to establish are the balance;

translations.literal: Balance, yin central region yellow river, ji river between.
translations.idiomatic: The balance is in Yin's central region, between the Yellow River and Ji River.

translations.literal: Dawn establish ones dipper head;
translations.idiomatic: Those who use dawn to establish are the dipper head;

translations.literal: Dipper head, sea tai northeast also.
translations.idiomatic: The dipper head is northeast of the sea and Mount Tai.

sentences.zh: 斗為帝車，運于中央，臨制四鄉。

translations.literal: Dipper is emperor chariot, moves at central, oversees controls four directions.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper is the emperor's chariot, moving at the center, overseeing and controlling the four directions.

sentences.zh: 分陰陽，建四時，均五行，移節度，定諸紀，皆系於斗。

translations.literal: Divide yin yang, establish four seasons, balance five phases, shift solar terms degrees, settle various records, all tied to dipper.
translations.idiomatic: It divides yin and yang, establishes the four seasons, balances the five phases, shifts the solar terms and degrees, settles the various records - all are tied to the Dipper.

sentences.zh: 斗魁戴匡六星曰文昌宮：一曰上將，二曰次將，三曰貴相，四曰司命，五曰司中，六曰司祿。

translations.literal: Dipper head wears box six stars called wen chang palace: one called upper general, two called secondary general, three called noble minister, four called director fate, five called director center, six called director salary.
translations.idiomatic: The six stars the dipper head wears in a box are called the Wen Chang Palace: one is called the upper general, two the secondary general, three the noble minister, four the director of fate, five the director of the center, six the director of salary.

translations.literal: In dipper head middle, noble people prison.
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of the dipper head is the noble people's prison.

sentences.zh: 魁下六星，兩兩相比者，名曰三能。

translations.literal: Dipper head below six stars, two two compared ones, named said three abilities.
translations.idiomatic: The six stars below the dipper head, those compared two by two, are named the three abilities.

translations.literal: Three abilities colors uniform, ruler minister harmonious;
translations.idiomatic: When the three abilities' colors are uniform, ruler and ministers are harmonious;

translations.literal: Not uniform, becomes contrary perverse.
translations.idiomatic: When not uniform, it becomes contrary and perverse.

translations.literal: Assistant stars bright close, assistant ministers close strong;
translations.idiomatic: When the assistant stars are bright and close, assistant ministers are close and strong;

translations.literal: Reject small, distant weak.
translations.idiomatic: When rejected and small, they are distant and weak.

sentences.zh: 杓端有兩星：一內為矛，招搖；

translations.literal: Dipper ladle end has two stars: one inner is spear, zhao yao;
translations.idiomatic: The dipper ladle end has two stars: the inner one is the spear, Zhao Yao;

translations.literal: One outer is shield, heaven blade.
translations.idiomatic: The outer one is the shield, Heaven Blade.

sentences.zh: 有句圜十五星，屬杓，曰賤人之牢。

translations.literal: Has bend round fifteen stars, belongs dipper ladle, called lowly people prison.
translations.idiomatic: There are fifteen stars in a bend and circle, belonging to the dipper ladle, called the lowly people's prison.

sentences.zh: 其牢中星實則囚多，虛則開出。

translations.literal: Its prison middle stars solid then prisoners many, empty then open out.
translations.idiomatic: When the stars in its prison are solid, there are many prisoners; when empty, they open and come out.

sentences.zh: 天一、槍、棓、矛、盾動搖，角大，兵起。

translations.literal: Heaven one, spear, mace, spear, shield move shake, horns large, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When Heaven One, Spear, Mace, Spear, and Shield move and shake, when the horns are large, soldiers rise.

translations.literal: East palace azure dragon, fang, xin.
translations.idiomatic: The eastern palace's azure dragon: Fang, Xin.

sentences.zh: 心為明堂，大星天王，前後星子屬。

translations.literal: Heart is bright hall, big star heaven king, front back stars child attendants.
translations.idiomatic: Xin is the bright hall, the big star is the heaven king, the front and back stars are the child attendants.

translations.literal: Not want straight, straight then heaven king loses strategy.
translations.idiomatic: It should not be straight; when straight, the heaven king loses his strategy.

translations.literal: Fang is residence, called heaven charioteer.
translations.idiomatic: Fang is the residence, called the heaven charioteer.

translations.literal: Its yin, right trace horse.
translations.idiomatic: Its yin is the right trace horse.

translations.literal: Side has two stars called collar;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are two stars called the collar;

translations.literal: North one star called boat.
translations.idiomatic: The one star to the north is called the boat.

translations.literal: Northeast bend twelve stars called banner.
translations.idiomatic: The twelve stars in the northeast bend are called the banner.

translations.literal: Banner middle four stars heaven market;
translations.idiomatic: The four stars in the banner's middle are the heaven market;

translations.literal: Middle six stars called market tower.
translations.idiomatic: The six stars in the middle are called the market tower.

translations.literal: Market middle stars numerous ones solid;
translations.idiomatic: When the stars in the market are numerous, it is solid;

translations.literal: Its empty then exhausted.
translations.idiomatic: When empty, then exhausted.

translations.literal: Fang south numerous stars called cavalry official.
translations.idiomatic: The numerous stars south of Fang are called the cavalry official.

translations.literal: Left horn, li;
translations.idiomatic: The left horn is Li;

translations.literal: Right horn, general.
translations.idiomatic: The right horn is the general.

translations.literal: Big horn ones, heaven king emperor court.
translations.idiomatic: The big horns are the heaven king's imperial court.

sentences.zh: 其兩旁各有三星，鼎足句之，曰攝提。

translations.literal: Its two sides each have three stars, tripod feet bend them, called sheti.
translations.idiomatic: On its two sides are three stars each, bent like tripod feet, called Sheti.

sentences.zh: 攝提者，直斗杓所指，以建時節，故曰「攝提格」。

translations.literal: Sheti ones, straight dipper ladle pointed to, to establish seasonal nodes, therefore called "sheti ge".
translations.idiomatic: The Sheti are what the dipper ladle points straight to in order to establish the seasonal nodes, therefore called 'Sheti Ge.'

translations.literal: Kang is distant temple, governs illness.
translations.idiomatic: Kang is the distant temple, governing illness.

translations.literal: Its south north two big stars, called south gate.
translations.idiomatic: Its two big stars to south and north are called the south gate.

translations.literal: Di is heaven root, governs epidemics.
translations.idiomatic: Di is the heaven root, governing epidemics.

translations.literal: Tail is nine sons, called ruler ministers;
translations.idiomatic: The tail is the nine sons, called ruler and ministers;

translations.literal: Rejected separated, not harmonious.
translations.idiomatic: When rejected and separated, not harmonious.

translations.literal: Ji is proud guest, called mouth tongue.
translations.idiomatic: Ji is the proud guest, called mouth and tongue.

translations.literal: Fire offends guards horn, then has war.
translations.idiomatic: When fire offends and guards the horn, then there is war.

translations.literal: Fang, xin, kings hate them also.
translations.idiomatic: Fang and Xin, kings hate them.

translations.literal: South palace vermilion bird, quan, heng.
translations.idiomatic: The southern palace's vermilion bird: Quan, Heng.

translations.literal: Heng, tai wei, three lights court.
translations.idiomatic: Heng, Taiwei, is the court of the three lights.

translations.literal: Protective guard twelve stars, feudal ministers: west, general;
translations.idiomatic: The twelve protective guard stars are feudal ministers: west, the general;

translations.literal: East, minister;
translations.idiomatic: East, the minister;

translations.literal: South four stars, execute law;
translations.idiomatic: South four stars, execute the law;

translations.literal: Middle, main gate;
translations.idiomatic: In the middle, the main gate;

translations.literal: Gate left right, side gates.
translations.idiomatic: To the gate's left and right are the side gates.

translations.literal: Gate inside six stars, feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: The six stars inside the gate are the feudal lords.

translations.literal: Its inside five stars, five emperors seats.
translations.idiomatic: The five stars inside it are the five emperors' seats.

sentences.zh: 後聚一十五星，蔚然，曰郎位；

translations.literal: Back gathered fifteen stars, luxuriant, called gentleman positions;
translations.idiomatic: The fifteen stars gathered in back, luxuriant, are called the gentleman positions;

translations.literal: Beside one big star, general position also.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it one big star is the general's position.

sentences.zh: 月、五星順入，軌道，司其出，所守，天子所誅也。

translations.literal: Moon, five stars compliant enter, proper path, oversee their exit, what guarded, heaven son punishes also.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon and five stars enter compliantly and follow the proper path, oversee their exit; what they guard is what the heaven son punishes.

sentences.zh: 其逆入，若不軌道，以所犯命之；

translations.literal: Their reverse enter, if not proper path, with what offended name them;
translations.idiomatic: When they enter in reverse or not follow the proper path, name them according to what they offended;

sentences.zh: 中坐，成形，皆群下從謀也。

translations.literal: Middle sit, form shape, all group below follow plot also.
translations.idiomatic: When they sit in the middle and form shapes, all the subordinates below follow in plotting.

translations.literal: Metal, fire especially severe.
translations.idiomatic: Metal and fire are especially severe.

sentences.zh: 廷藩西有隋星五，曰少微，士大夫。

translations.literal: Court vassal west has sui stars five, called little wei, scholar officials.
translations.idiomatic: To the west of the court vassals are five Sui stars, called Little Wei, the scholar officials.

translations.literal: Quan, xuan yuan.
translations.idiomatic: Quan, Xuanyuan.

translations.literal: Xuan yuan, yellow dragon body.
translations.idiomatic: Xuanyuan is the yellow dragon's body.

translations.literal: Front big star, female lord image;
translations.idiomatic: The big star in front is the female lord's image;

translations.literal: Beside small stars, charioteer rear palace attendants.
translations.idiomatic: The small stars beside are the charioteer and rear palace attendants.

translations.literal: Moon, five stars guard offend ones, like heng divination.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon and five stars guard and offend, it is like the heng divination.

translations.literal: East well is water affairs.
translations.idiomatic: The east well is water affairs.

translations.literal: Its west bend star called battle axe.
translations.idiomatic: Its west bend star is called the battle axe.

translations.literal: Battle axe north, north river;
translations.idiomatic: North of the battle axe is the north river;

translations.literal: South, south river;
translations.idiomatic: South is the south river;

translations.literal: Two rivers, heaven gate between is pass bridge.
translations.idiomatic: Between the two rivers and heaven gate is the pass and bridge.

translations.literal: Yu gui, ghost shrine affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Yu Gui are ghost shrine affairs;

translations.literal: Middle white ones are hostage.
translations.idiomatic: The white ones in the middle are the hostage.

sentences.zh: 火守南北河，兵起，穀不登。

translations.literal: Fire guards north south rivers, soldiers rise, grain not harvest.
translations.idiomatic: When fire guards the north and south rivers, soldiers rise, grain does not harvest.

sentences.zh: 故德成衡，觀成潢，傷成鉞，禍成井，誅成質。

translations.literal: Therefore virtue becomes heng, observation becomes huang, injury becomes battle axe, calamity becomes well, execution becomes hostage.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore virtue forms in heng, observation forms in huang, injury forms in battle axe, calamity forms in well, execution forms in hostage.

translations.literal: Liu is bird beak, governs wood grass.
translations.idiomatic: Liu is the bird's beak, governing wood and grass.

translations.literal: Seven stars, neck, is official personnel.
translations.idiomatic: The seven stars are the neck, the official personnel.

translations.literal: Governs urgent affairs.
translations.idiomatic: It governs urgent affairs.

translations.literal: Zhang, su, is kitchen, governs banquet guests.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang and Su are the kitchen, governing banquet guests.

translations.literal: Yi is feather wings, governs distant guests.
translations.idiomatic: Yi is the feather wings, governing distant guests.

translations.literal: Zhen is chariot, governs wind.
translations.idiomatic: Zhen is the chariot, governing wind.

sentences.zh: 其旁有一小星，曰長沙，星星不欲明；

translations.literal: Its side has one small star, called changsha, star star not want bright;
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one small star, called Changsha; the star should not be bright;

sentences.zh: 明與四星等，若五星入軫中，兵大起。

translations.literal: Bright with four stars equal, if five stars enter zhen middle, soldiers greatly rise.
translations.idiomatic: When bright and equal to four stars, if five stars enter Zhen's middle, soldiers greatly rise.

translations.literal: Zhen south numerous stars called heaven storehouse tower;
translations.idiomatic: The numerous stars south of Zhen are called the heaven storehouse tower;

translations.literal: Storehouse has five chariots.
translations.idiomatic: The storehouse has five chariots.

sentences.zh: 車星角若益眾，及不具，無處車馬。

translations.literal: Chariot star horns if increase numerous, and not complete, nowhere chariots horses.
translations.idiomatic: If the chariot star horns increase in number, or are incomplete, there are no chariots and horses anywhere.

translations.literal: West palace xian pond, called heaven five huang.
translations.idiomatic: The west palace's Xian Pond is called the heaven five huang.

translations.literal: Five huang, five emperors chariot lodging.
translations.idiomatic: The five huang are the five emperors' chariot lodging.

translations.literal: Fire enters, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When fire enters, drought;

translations.literal: Metal, soldiers;
translations.idiomatic: Metal, soldiers;

translations.literal: Water, water.
translations.idiomatic: Water, floods.

translations.literal: Middle has three pillars;
translations.idiomatic: In the middle are three pillars;

translations.literal: Pillars not complete, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When the pillars are incomplete, soldiers rise.

translations.literal: Kui called sealed pig, is ditches drains.
translations.idiomatic: Kui is called the sealed pig, being the ditches and drains.

translations.literal: Lou is gather crowd.
translations.idiomatic: Lou is gathering the crowd.

translations.literal: Wei is heaven granary.
translations.idiomatic: Wei is the heaven granary.

translations.literal: Its south numerous stars called ao ji.
translations.idiomatic: The numerous stars to its south are called Ao Ji.

sentences.zh: 昴曰髦頭，胡星也，為白衣會。

translations.literal: Mao called mao head, barbarian star also, is white clothes assembly.
translations.idiomatic: Mao is called the mao head, a barbarian star, being the white clothes assembly.

sentences.zh: 畢曰罕車，為邊兵，主弋獵。

translations.literal: Bi called han chariot, is border soldiers, governs archery hunting.
translations.idiomatic: Bi is called the han chariot, being border soldiers, governing archery and hunting.

translations.literal: Its big star beside small stars are attached ears.
translations.idiomatic: The small stars beside its big star are the attached ears.

sentences.zh: 附耳搖動，有讒亂臣在側。

translations.literal: Attached ears shake move, have slanderous chaotic ministers at side.
translations.idiomatic: When the attached ears shake and move, there are slanderous chaotic ministers at the side.

translations.literal: Mao, bi between is heaven street.
translations.idiomatic: Between Mao and Bi is the heaven street.

translations.literal: Its yin, yin states;
translations.idiomatic: Its yin is the yin states;

translations.literal: Yang, yang states.
translations.idiomatic: Yang is the yang states.

translations.literal: Shen is white tiger.
translations.idiomatic: Shen is the white tiger.

translations.literal: Three stars straight ones, this is heng stone.
translations.idiomatic: The three stars that are straight are the heng stone.

sentences.zh: 下有三星，兌，曰罰，為斬艾事。

translations.literal: Below has three stars, joyful, called punishment, is cut ai affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Below are three stars, joyful, called punishment, being matters of cutting and mowing.

translations.literal: Its outer four stars, left right shoulders thighs also.
translations.idiomatic: Its outer four stars are the left and right shoulders and thighs.

sentences.zh: 小三星隅置，曰觜觿，為虎首，主葆旅事。

translations.literal: Small three stars corner placed, called zi xi, is tiger head, governs preserve travel affairs.
translations.idiomatic: The small three stars placed in the corner are called Zi Xi, being the tiger head, governing matters of preserving and traveling.

translations.literal: Its south has four stars, called heaven toilet.
translations.idiomatic: To its south are four stars, called the heaven toilet.

translations.literal: Toilet below one star, called heaven arrow.
translations.idiomatic: Below the toilet is one star, called the heaven arrow.

translations.literal: Arrow yellow then auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When the arrow is yellow, then auspicious;

translations.literal: Blue, white, black, inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: Blue, white, black are inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 其西有句曲九星，三處羅：一曰天旗，二曰天苑，三曰九游。

translations.literal: Its west has bend curved nine stars, three places arranged: one called heaven banner, two called heaven garden, three called nine wander.
translations.idiomatic: To its west are nine stars in bends and curves, arranged in three places: one called the heaven banner, two called the heaven garden, three called the nine wander.

translations.literal: Its east has big star called wolf.
translations.idiomatic: To its east is a big star called the wolf.

translations.literal: Wolf horns change color, many bandits thieves.
translations.idiomatic: When the wolf's horns change color, there are many bandits and thieves.

translations.literal: Below has four stars called arc, straight wolf.
translations.idiomatic: Below are four stars called the arc, straight as the wolf.

sentences.zh: 狼比地有大星，曰南極老人。

translations.literal: Wolf alongside ground has big star, called south pole old man.
translations.idiomatic: Alongside the wolf near the ground is a big star, called the south pole old man.

translations.literal: Old man seen, peace order;
translations.idiomatic: When the old man is seen, there is peace and order;

translations.literal: Not seen, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When not seen, soldiers rise.

sentences.zh: 常以秋分時候之于南郊。

translations.literal: Constantly at autumn equinox time observe it at south suburb.
translations.idiomatic: It is constantly observed at the autumn equinox time in the south suburb.

translations.literal: Attached ears enter bi middle, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When the attached ears enter Bi's middle, soldiers rise.

translations.literal: North palace xuan wu, xu, wei.
translations.idiomatic: The northern palace's Xuan Wu: Xu, Wei.

translations.literal: Wei is cover house;
translations.idiomatic: Wei is the covering house;

translations.literal: Xu is weeping matters.
translations.idiomatic: Xu is matters of weeping.

sentences.zh: 其南有眾星，曰羽林天軍。

translations.literal: Its south has numerous stars, called feather forest heaven army.
translations.idiomatic: To its south are numerous stars, called the feather forest heaven army.

translations.literal: Army west is rampart, or called battle axe.
translations.idiomatic: West of the army is the rampart, or called the battle axe.

translations.literal: Beside has one big star is north fall.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it is one big star that is the north fall.

sentences.zh: 北落若微亡，軍星動角益希，及五星犯北落，入軍，軍起。

translations.literal: North fall if faint gone, army stars move horns increasingly rare, and five stars offend north fall, enter army, army rises.
translations.idiomatic: If the north fall is faint or gone, the army stars move and their horns become increasingly rare, and when the five stars offend the north fall and enter the army, the army rises.

translations.literal: Fire, metal, water especially severe: fire, army worry;
translations.idiomatic: Fire, metal, water are especially severe: fire brings army worry;

translations.literal: Water, water calamity;
translations.idiomatic: Water brings water calamity;

translations.literal: Wood, earth, army auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: Wood and earth bring army good fortune.

sentences.zh: 危東六星，兩兩相比，曰司空。

translations.literal: Wei east six stars, two two compared, called director of works.
translations.idiomatic: East of Wei, six stars compared two by two, are called the director of works.

sentences.zh: 營室為清廟，曰離宮、閣道。

translations.literal: Camp room is pure temple, called detached palace, corridor way.
translations.idiomatic: The camp room is the pure temple, called the detached palace and corridor way.

translations.literal: Milky way middle four stars, called heaven charioteer.
translations.idiomatic: In the middle of the Milky Way, four stars are called the heaven charioteer.

translations.literal: Beside one star, called wang liang.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it one star is called Wang Liang.

translations.literal: Wang liang whips horse, chariots cavalry fill fields.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Liang whips his horse, chariots and cavalry fill the fields.

translations.literal: Beside has eight stars, cross milky way, called heaven huang.
translations.idiomatic: Beside it are eight stars crossing the Milky Way, called the heaven huang.

translations.literal: Heaven huang beside, river star.
translations.idiomatic: Beside the heaven huang is the river star.

translations.literal: River star moves, people ford water.
translations.idiomatic: When the river star moves, people ford the water.

translations.literal: Pestle, mortar four stars, in wei south.
translations.idiomatic: The four stars of pestle and mortar are south of Wei.

sentences.zh: 匏瓜，有青黑星守之，魚鹽貴。

translations.literal: Gourd melon, has blue black stars guard it, fish salt expensive.
translations.idiomatic: The gourd melon, when guarded by blue and black stars, makes fish and salt expensive.

translations.literal: South dipper is temple, its north build star.
translations.idiomatic: The south dipper is the temple, north of it is the build star.

translations.literal: Build star ones, banner also.
translations.idiomatic: The build stars are banners.

translations.literal: Lead ox is sacrificial animals.
translations.idiomatic: The lead ox is the sacrificial animals.

translations.literal: Its north river drum.
translations.idiomatic: North of it is the river drum.

translations.literal: River drum big star, upper general;
translations.idiomatic: The river drum's big star is the upper general;

translations.literal: Left right, left right generals.
translations.idiomatic: Left and right are the left and right generals.

translations.literal: Wu female, its north weave female.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Female, north of it is Weave Female.

translations.literal: Weave female, heaven female grandson also.
translations.idiomatic: Weave Female is the heaven female's grandson.

sentences.zh: 察日、月之行以揆歲星順逆。

translations.literal: Observe sun, moon movements to gauge year star forward backward.
translations.idiomatic: Observe the movements of the sun and moon to gauge the year star's forward and backward motion.

translations.literal: Called eastern wood, governs spring, days jia yi.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the eastern wood, governs spring, days Jia and Yi.

translations.literal: Righteousness lost ones, punishment appears year star.
translations.idiomatic: Those who lose righteousness, punishment appears in the year star.

translations.literal: Year star surplus contraction, with its dwelling names states.
translations.idiomatic: The year star's surplus and contraction names the states according to its dwelling.

sentences.zh: 所在國不可伐，可以罰人。

translations.literal: Located state cannot attack, can punish people.
translations.idiomatic: The state where it is located cannot be attacked, but people can be punished.

sentences.zh: 其趨舍而前曰贏，退舍曰縮。

translations.literal: Its advance dwell forward called surplus, retreat dwell called contraction.
translations.idiomatic: When it advances and dwells forward, it is called surplus; when it retreats and dwells, it is called contraction.

translations.literal: Surplus, its state has soldiers not return;
translations.idiomatic: When surplus, its state has soldiers who do not return;

sentences.zh: 縮，其國有憂，將亡，國傾敗。

translations.literal: Contraction, its state has worry, will perish, state tilts defeats.
translations.idiomatic: When contraction, its state has worry, will perish, the state tilts and is defeated.

sentences.zh: 其所在，五星皆從而聚於一舍，其下之國可以義致天下。

translations.literal: Its location, five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below states can with righteousness bring all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: Where it is located, the five stars all follow and gather at one lodge; the states below it can with righteousness bring all under heaven.

sentences.zh: 以攝提格歲：歲陰左行在寅，歲星右轉居丑。

translations.literal: With sheti ge year: year yin left moves in yin, year star right turns dwells chou.
translations.idiomatic: Using the Sheti Ge year: the year yin moves left in Yin, the year star turns right and dwells in Chou.

sentences.zh: 正月，與斗、牽牛晨出東方，名曰監德。

translations.literal: First month, with dipper, lead ox morning out eastern, named called supervise virtue.
translations.idiomatic: In the first month, it comes out in the morning in the east with the dipper and lead ox, named 'supervise virtue.'

translations.literal: Color azure azure has light.
translations.idiomatic: Its color is azure and has light.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see liu.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Liu.

translations.literal: Year early, water;
translations.idiomatic: When the year is early, water;

translations.literal: Late, drought.
translations.idiomatic: When late, drought.

sentences.zh: 歲星出，東行十二度，百日而止，反逆行；

translations.literal: Year star appears, east moves twelve degrees, hundred days then stops, reverses inverse moves;
translations.idiomatic: When the year star appears, it moves east twelve degrees, stops after a hundred days, then reverses and moves inversely;

translations.literal: Inverse moves eight degrees, hundred days, again east moves.
translations.idiomatic: It moves inversely eight degrees, after a hundred days, then moves east again.

sentences.zh: 歲行三十度十六分度之七，率日行十二分度之一，十二歲而周天。

translations.literal: Year moves thirty degrees sixteen sevenths degree, rate daily moves one twelfth degree, twelve years completes heaven.
translations.idiomatic: It moves thirty degrees and sixteen-sevenths of a degree; the daily rate is one-twelfth of a degree; in twelve years it completes the circuit of heaven.

translations.literal: Appears always eastern, with morning;
translations.idiomatic: It always appears in the east, in the morning;

translations.literal: Enters western, uses dusk.
translations.idiomatic: It enters in the west, using dusk.

sentences.zh: 單閼歲：歲陰在卯，星居子。

translations.literal: Dan e year: year yin in mao, star dwells zi.
translations.idiomatic: Dan E year: the year yin is in Mao, the star dwells in Zi.

sentences.zh: 以二月與婺女、虛、危晨出，曰降入。

translations.literal: With second month with wu female, xu, wei morning out, called descend enter.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month it comes out in the morning with Wu Female, Xu, and Wei, called 'descend enter.'

translations.literal: Great has light.
translations.idiomatic: It has great light.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see zhang.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Zhang.

translations.literal: [Named called descend enter] its year great water.
translations.idiomatic: [Named 'descend enter'] that year has great floods.

sentences.zh: 執徐歲：歲陰在辰，星居亥。

translations.literal: Zhi xu year: year yin in chen, star dwells hai.
translations.idiomatic: Zhi Xu year: the year yin is in Chen, the star dwells in Hai.

sentences.zh: 以三月［居］與營室、東壁晨出，曰青章。

translations.literal: With third month [dwells] with camp room, east wall morning out, called green chapter.
translations.idiomatic: In the third month [it dwells] and comes out in the morning with the camp room and east wall, called 'green chapter.'

translations.literal: Green green very clear.
translations.idiomatic: Very green and clear.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence;
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence;

translations.literal: Has response see zhen.
translations.idiomatic: There is a response seen in Zhen.

translations.literal: [Called green chapter] year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: [Called 'green chapter'] when the year is early, drought;

translations.literal: Late, water.
translations.idiomatic: When late, floods.

sentences.zh: 大荒駱歲：歲陰在巳，星居戌。

translations.literal: Great wilderness luo year: year yin in si, star dwells xu.
translations.idiomatic: Great Wilderness Luo year: the year yin is in Si, the star dwells in Xu.

sentences.zh: 以四月與奎、婁［胃昴］晨出，曰跰踵。

translations.literal: With fourth month with kui, lou [wei mao] morning out, called pin zhong.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month it comes out in the morning with Kui and Lou [Wei Mao], called 'pin zhong.'

translations.literal: Bear bear red color, has light.
translations.idiomatic: Bear-like red color, has light.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see kang.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Kang.

sentences.zh: 敦牂歲：歲陰在午，星居酉。

translations.literal: Dun zang year: year yin in wu, star dwells you.
translations.idiomatic: Dun Zang year: the year yin is in Wu, the star dwells in You.

sentences.zh: 以五月與胃、昴、畢晨出，曰開明。

translations.literal: With fifth month with wei, mao, bi morning out, called kai ming.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month it comes out in the morning with Wei, Mao, and Bi, called 'kai ming.'

translations.literal: Blazing blazing has light.
translations.idiomatic: Blazing and has light.

translations.literal: Rest soldiers;
translations.idiomatic: Rest the soldiers;

translations.literal: Only beneficial duke king, not beneficial manage soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: Only beneficial for the duke and king, not beneficial for managing soldiers.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see fang.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Fang.

translations.literal: Year early, drought;
translations.idiomatic: When the year is early, drought;

translations.literal: Late, water.
translations.idiomatic: When late, floods.

sentences.zh: 協洽歲：歲陰在未，星居申。

translations.literal: Xie qia year: year yin in wei, star dwells shen.
translations.idiomatic: Xie Qia year: the year yin is in Wei, the star dwells in Shen.

sentences.zh: 以六月與觜觿、參晨出，曰長列。

translations.literal: With sixth month with zi xi, shen morning out, called long array.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month it comes out in the morning with Zi Xi and Shen, called 'long array.'

translations.literal: Bright bright has light.
translations.idiomatic: Bright and has light.

translations.literal: Beneficial move soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: Beneficial for moving soldiers.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see ji.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Ji.

sentences.zh: 涒灘歲：歲陰在申，星居未。

translations.literal: Dun tan year: year yin in shen, star dwells wei.
translations.idiomatic: Dun Tan year: the year yin is in Shen, the star dwells in Wei.

sentences.zh: 以七月與東井、輿鬼晨出，曰大音。

translations.literal: With seventh month with east well, yu gui morning out, called great sound.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month it comes out in the morning with the east well and yu gui, called 'great sound.'

translations.literal: Bright bright white.
translations.idiomatic: Bright and white.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see lead ox.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in the lead ox.

sentences.zh: 作鄂歲：歲陰在酉，星居午。

translations.literal: Zuo e year: year yin in you, star dwells wu.
translations.idiomatic: Zuo E year: the year yin is in You, the star dwells in Wu.

sentences.zh: 以八月與柳、七星、張晨出，曰（為）長王。

translations.literal: With eighth month with liu, seven stars, zhang morning out, called (is) long king.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth month it comes out in the morning with Liu, the seven stars, and Zhang, called 'long king.'

translations.literal: Zuo zuo has spikes.
translations.idiomatic: Zuo zuo and has spikes.

translations.literal: State its prosperous, ripe grain.
translations.idiomatic: The state prospers, grain ripens.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see wei.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Wei.

sentences.zh: ［曰大章］有旱而昌，有女喪，民疾。

translations.literal: [Called great chapter] has drought yet prosperous, has female mourning, people illness.
translations.idiomatic: [Called 'great chapter'] has drought yet prospers, has female mourning, people illness.

sentences.zh: 閹茂歲：歲陰在戌，星居巳。

translations.literal: Yan mao year: year yin in xu, star dwells si.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Mao year: the year yin is in Xu, the star dwells in Si.

sentences.zh: 以九月與翼、軫晨出，曰天睢。

translations.literal: With ninth month with yi, zhen morning out, called heaven sui.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month it comes out in the morning with Yi and Zhen, called 'heaven sui.'

translations.literal: White color greatly bright.
translations.idiomatic: White color, greatly bright.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see east wall.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in the east wall.

translations.literal: Year floods, female mourning.
translations.idiomatic: The year has floods, female mourning.

sentences.zh: 大淵獻歲：歲陰在亥，星居辰。

translations.literal: Great yuan xian year: year yin in hai, star dwells chen.
translations.idiomatic: Great Yuan Xian year: the year yin is in Hai, the star dwells in Chen.

sentences.zh: 以十月與角、亢晨出，曰大章。

translations.literal: With tenth month with horn, kang morning out, called great chapter.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month it comes out in the morning with the horn and kang, called 'great chapter.'

sentences.zh: 蒼蒼然，星若躍而陰出旦，是謂「正平」。

translations.literal: Azure azure appearance, star as if leap yet yin out dawn, this called "correct level".
translations.idiomatic: Azure in appearance, the star as if leaping yet comes out yin at dawn, this is called 'correct level.'

translations.literal: Raise troops armies, its leader must martial;
translations.idiomatic: When raising troops and armies, its leader must be martial;

translations.literal: Its state has virtue, will have four seas.
translations.idiomatic: Its state has virtue, will have the four seas.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see lou.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Lou.

sentences.zh: 困敦歲：歲陰在子，星居卯。

translations.literal: Kun dun year: year yin in zi, star dwells mao.
translations.idiomatic: Kun Dun year: the year yin is in Zi, the star dwells in Mao.

sentences.zh: 以十一月與氐、房、心晨出，曰天泉。

translations.literal: With eleventh month with di, fang, xin morning out, called heaven spring.
translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month it comes out in the morning with Di, Fang, and Xin, called 'heaven spring.'

translations.literal: Dark color very bright.
translations.idiomatic: Dark color, very bright.

translations.literal: Rivers pools its prosperous, not beneficial raise soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: Rivers and pools prosper, not beneficial to raise soldiers.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response (in) [see] mao.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Mao.

sentences.zh: 赤奮若歲：歲陰在丑，星居寅，以十二月與尾、箕晨出，曰天皓。

translations.literal: Chi fen ruo year: year yin in chou, star dwells yin, with twelfth month with tail, ji morning out, called heaven hao.
translations.idiomatic: Chi Fen Ruo year: the year yin is in Chou, the star dwells in Yin; in the twelfth month it comes out in the morning with the tail and ji, called 'heaven hao.'

translations.literal: Zhen appearance black color very bright.
translations.idiomatic: Zhen in appearance, black color very bright.

translations.literal: Its misses sequence, has response see shen.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence, there is a response seen in Shen.

sentences.zh: 當居不居，居之又左右搖，未當去去之，與他星會，其國凶。

translations.literal: Should dwell not dwell, dwell it yet left right shake, not yet should go go it, with other stars meet, its state inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it should dwell but does not dwell, when it dwells it shakes left and right, when it should not go yet goes it, when it meets with other stars, its state is inauspicious.

translations.literal: What dwells long, state has virtue thick.
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells long, the state has thick virtue.

sentences.zh: 其角動，乍小乍大，若色數變，人主有憂。

translations.literal: Its horns move, suddenly small suddenly big, as if color several times change, person lord has worry.
translations.idiomatic: When its horns move, suddenly small suddenly big, as if the color changes several times, the person lord has worry.

sentences.zh: 其失次舍以下，進而東北，三月生天棓，長四丈，末兌，進而東南，三月生彗星，長二丈，類彗。

translations.literal: Its misses sequence lodges below, advance northeast, three months produce heaven mace, long four zhang, end joyful, advance southeast, three months produce comet star, long two zhang, like comet.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence and lodges below, advancing northeast, in three months produces the heaven mace, four zhang long, joyful at the end; advancing southeast, in three months produces a comet star, two zhang long, like a comet.

sentences.zh: 退而西北，三月生天欃，長四丈，末兌。

translations.literal: Retreat northwest, three months produce heaven chan, long four zhang, end joyful.
translations.idiomatic: Retreating northwest, in three months produces the heaven chan, four zhang long, joyful at the end.

sentences.zh: 退而西南，三月生天槍，長數丈，兩頭兌。

translations.literal: Retreat southwest, three months produce heaven spear, long several zhang, two ends joyful.
translations.idiomatic: Retreating southwest, in three months produces the heaven spear, several zhang long, joyful at both ends.

sentences.zh: 謹視其所見之國，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: Carefully observe its seen states, cannot undertake affairs use soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: Carefully observe the states where it is seen; cannot undertake affairs or use soldiers.

sentences.zh: 其出如浮如沈，其國有土功；

translations.literal: Its appear as float as sink, its state has earth works;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears as if floating or sinking, its state has earth works;

translations.literal: As sink as float, its fields perish.
translations.idiomatic: When as if sinking or floating, its fields perish.

sentences.zh: 色赤而有角，其所居國昌。

translations.literal: Color red and has horns, its dwelled states prosperous.
translations.idiomatic: When the color is red and has horns, the states where it dwells prosper.

translations.literal: Meet horns and fight ones, not victorious.
translations.idiomatic: Those who meet the horns and fight are not victorious.

sentences.zh: 星色赤黃而沈，所居野大穰。

translations.literal: Star color red yellow and sink, dwelled fields greatly abundant.
translations.idiomatic: When the star's color is red-yellow and sinks, the dwelled fields are greatly abundant.

sentences.zh: 色青白而赤灰，所居野有憂。

translations.literal: Color blue white yet red ash, dwelled fields have worry.
translations.idiomatic: When the color is blue-white yet red-ash, the dwelled fields have worry.

translations.literal: Year star enters moon, its fields have expel minister;
translations.idiomatic: When the year star enters the moon, its fields have an expelled minister;

translations.literal: With tai bai fight, its fields have broken army.
translations.idiomatic: When it fights with Tai Bai, its fields have a broken army.

sentences.zh: 歲星一曰攝提，曰重華，曰應星，曰紀星。

translations.literal: Year star one called sheti, called chong hua, called respond star, called record star.
translations.idiomatic: The year star is also called Sheti, called Chong Hua, called the respond star, called the record star.

translations.literal: Camp room is pure temple, year star temple also.
translations.idiomatic: The camp room is the pure temple, the year star's temple.

translations.literal: Observe firm qi to place ying huo.
translations.idiomatic: Observe the firm qi to place Ying Huo.

translations.literal: Called southern fire, governs summer, days bing, ding.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the southern fire, governs summer, days Bing and Ding.

sentences.zh: 禮失，罰出熒惑，熒惑失行是也。

translations.literal: Ritual lost, punishment appears ying huo, ying huo loses movement is also.
translations.idiomatic: When ritual is lost, punishment appears in Ying Huo; Ying Huo's loss of movement is this.

translations.literal: Appears then has soldiers, enters then soldiers disperse.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears there are soldiers, when it enters soldiers disperse.

translations.literal: With its lodges names states.
translations.idiomatic: It names the states according to its lodges.

sentences.zh: （熒惑）熒惑為勃亂，殘賊、疾、喪、饑、兵。

translations.literal: (Ying huo) ying huo is sudden chaos, cruel bandits, illness, mourning, famine, soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: (Ying Huo) Ying Huo is sudden chaos, cruel bandits, illness, mourning, famine, soldiers.

sentences.zh: 反道二舍以上，居之，三月有殃，五月受兵，七月半亡地，九月太半亡地。

translations.literal: Against way two lodges above, dwells it, three months has calamity, five months receives soldiers, seven months half loses land, nine months great half loses land.
translations.idiomatic: When it goes against the way two lodges or more, dwelling there, in three months there is calamity, five months receives soldiers, seven months loses half the land, nine months loses the greater half of the land.

translations.literal: Therefore with together enter exit, state cuts off sacrifices.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore when it enters and exits together with it, the state cuts off its sacrifices.

translations.literal: Dwells it, calamity returns arrives, though big should small;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells there, calamity returns and arrives; though big it should be small;

translations.literal: Long then arrives, should small reverses big.
translations.idiomatic: When it arrives after a long time, what should be small reverses to big.

sentences.zh: 其南為丈夫［喪］，北為女子喪。

translations.literal: Its south is husband [mourning], north is woman mourning.
translations.idiomatic: To its south is husband mourning, to the north is woman mourning.

sentences.zh: 若角動繞環之，及乍前乍後，左右，殃益大。

translations.literal: If horns move circle surround it, and suddenly front suddenly back, left right, calamity increasingly big.
translations.idiomatic: If the horns move circling around it, and suddenly front suddenly back, left and right, the calamity becomes increasingly big.

translations.literal: With other stars fight, light mutually catches, is harm;
translations.idiomatic: When it fights with other stars and their lights catch each other, it is harmful;

translations.literal: Not mutually catch, not harmful.
translations.idiomatic: When they do not catch each other, not harmful.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下國可以禮致天下。

translations.literal: Five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below states can with ritual bring all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, the states below it can with ritual bring all under heaven.

translations.literal: Rule, appears east moves sixteen lodges then stops;
translations.idiomatic: By rule, it appears and moves east sixteen lodges then stops;

translations.literal: Inverse moves two lodges;
translations.idiomatic: It moves inversely two lodges;

sentences.zh: 六旬，復東行，自所止數十舍，十月而入西方；

translations.literal: Sixty days, again east moves, from what stopped counts tens lodges, ten months then enters western;
translations.idiomatic: After sixty days, it moves east again, from where it stopped counts tens of lodges, after ten months enters the west;

translations.literal: Hidden moves five months, appears eastern.
translations.idiomatic: It moves hidden for five months, then appears in the east.

sentences.zh: 其出西方曰「反明」，主命者惡之。

translations.literal: Its appear western called "reverse bright", governs fate ones hate it.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the west it is called 'reverse bright'; those who govern fate hate it.

translations.literal: East moves urgent, one day moves one degree half.
translations.idiomatic: When moving east urgently, it moves one and a half degrees per day.

translations.literal: Its moves east, west, south, north rapid also.
translations.idiomatic: Its movements east, west, south, and north are rapid.

translations.literal: Soldiers each gather its below;
translations.idiomatic: Soldiers each gather below it;

translations.literal: Use battle, comply it victorious, oppose it defeated.
translations.idiomatic: When using battle, complying with it brings victory, opposing it brings defeat.

translations.literal: Ying huo follows tai bai, army worry;
translations.idiomatic: When Ying Huo follows Tai Bai, army worry;

translations.literal: Separates it, army retreats.
translations.idiomatic: When it separates, the army retreats.

translations.literal: Appears tai bai yin, has divide army;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in Tai Bai's yin, there is a divided army;

translations.literal: Moves its yang, has partial general battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it moves in its yang, there is a partial general battle.

sentences.zh: 當其行，太白逮之，破軍殺將。

translations.literal: When its moves, tai bai catches it, breaks army kills general.
translations.idiomatic: When it is moving and Tai Bai catches it, it breaks the army and kills the general.

sentences.zh: 其入守犯太微、軒轅、營室，主命惡之。

translations.literal: Its enters guards offends tai wei, xuan yuan, camp room, governs fate hates it.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters and guards or offends Tai Wei, Xuan Yuan, and Camp Room, those who govern fate hate it.

translations.literal: Xin is bright hall, ying huo temple also.
translations.idiomatic: Xin is the bright hall, Ying Huo's temple.

translations.literal: Carefully observe this.
translations.idiomatic: Carefully observe this.

sentences.zh: 歷斗之會以定填星之位。

translations.literal: Examine dipper meetings to settle tian xing position.
translations.idiomatic: Examine the dipper's meetings to settle the Tian Xing's position.

sentences.zh: 曰中央土，主季夏，日戊、己，黃帝，主德，女主象也。

translations.literal: Called central earth, governs late summer, days wu, ji, yellow emperor, governs virtue, female lord image also.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the central earth, governs late summer, days Wu and Ji, Yellow Emperor, governs virtue, being the female lord's image.

translations.literal: Year tian one lodge, its dwelled states auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When the year Tian is in one lodge, the states where it dwells are auspicious.

sentences.zh: 未當居而居，若已去而復還，還居之，其國得土，不乃得女。

translations.literal: Not yet should dwell yet dwells, if already gone yet again returns, returns dwells it, its state gets earth, not then gets woman.
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells when it should not yet dwell, if it has already gone yet returns again, returns and dwells there, its state gets earth, or else gets a woman.

sentences.zh: 若當居而不居，既已居之，又西東去，其國失土，不乃失女，不可舉事用兵。

translations.literal: If should dwell not dwell, already dwells it, again west east goes, its state loses earth, not then loses woman, cannot undertake affairs use soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: If it should dwell but does not dwell, having already dwelt there, it then goes west or east, its state loses earth, or else loses a woman; cannot undertake affairs or use soldiers.

translations.literal: Its dwells long, its state fortune thick;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells long, its state's fortune is thick;

translations.literal: Easy, fortune thin.
translations.idiomatic: When easy, fortune is thin.

translations.literal: Its one name called earth marquis, governs years.
translations.idiomatic: Its one name is called Earth Marquis, governing years.

sentences.zh: 歲行十（二）［三］度百十二分度之五，日行二十八分度之一，二十八歲周天。

translations.literal: Year moves ten (two) [three] degrees one hundred twelve fifths degree, daily moves one twenty-eighth degree, twenty-eight years completes heaven.
translations.idiomatic: It moves thirteen degrees and one hundred twelve-fifths of a degree; daily moves one twenty-eighth of a degree; in twenty-eight years completes the circuit of heaven.

sentences.zh: 其所居，五星皆從而聚于一舍，其下之國，可［以］重致天下。

translations.literal: Its dwelled, five stars all follow and gather at one lodge, its below states, can [with] weight bring all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: Where it dwells, the five stars all follow and gather at one lodge; the states below it can with weight bring all under heaven.

sentences.zh: 禮、德、義、殺、刑盡失，而填星乃為之動搖。

translations.literal: Ritual, virtue, righteousness, killing, punishment all lost, yet tian xing then for it moves shakes.
translations.idiomatic: When ritual, virtue, righteousness, killing, and punishment are all lost, then the Tian Xing moves and shakes for it.

translations.literal: Surplus, for king not peaceful;
translations.idiomatic: When surplus, the king is not peaceful;

translations.literal: Its contraction, has army not return.
translations.idiomatic: When it contracts, there is an army that does not return.

sentences.zh: 填星，其色黃，九芒，音曰黃鐘宮。

translations.literal: Tian star, its color yellow, nine spikes, sound called yellow bell gong.
translations.idiomatic: The Tian star, its color yellow, nine spikes, sound called Yellow Bell Gong.

sentences.zh: 其失次上二三宿曰贏，有主命不成，不乃大水。

translations.literal: Its misses sequence up two three lodges called surplus, has governs fate not accomplish, not then great water.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence up two or three lodges, it is called surplus; there is governing fate not accomplished, or else great floods.

sentences.zh: 失次下二三宿曰縮，有后戚，其歲不復，不乃天裂若地動。

translations.literal: Misses sequence down two three lodges called contraction, has queen sorrow, its year not return, not then heaven cracks if earth moves.
translations.idiomatic: When it misses its sequence down two or three lodges, it is called contraction; there is queen sorrow, that year does not return, or else heaven cracks or earth moves.

sentences.zh: 斗為文太室，填星廟，天子之星也。

translations.literal: Dipper is wen great chamber, tian star temple, heaven son star also.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper is the Wen Great Chamber, the Tian star's temple, the Heaven Son's star.

translations.literal: Wood star with earth unites, is inner chaos.
translations.idiomatic: When the wood star unites with earth, it is inner chaos.

translations.literal: Famine, governs not use battle, defeated;
translations.idiomatic: Famine; governs not to use battle, defeated;

translations.literal: Water then changes strategy yet changes affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Water then changes strategy and changes affairs;

translations.literal: Fire is drought;
translations.idiomatic: Fire is drought;

translations.literal: Metal is white clothes assembly if water.
translations.idiomatic: Metal is white clothes assembly or floods.

sentences.zh: 金在南曰牝牡，年穀熟，金在北，歲偏無。

translations.literal: Metal in south called female male, year grain ripe, metal in north, year partial none.
translations.idiomatic: When metal is in the south, it is called female and male, the year's grain ripens; when metal is in the north, the year is partially without.

sentences.zh: 火與水合為焠，與金合為鑠，為喪，皆不可舉事，用兵大敗。

translations.literal: Fire with water unites is cui, with metal unites is shuo, is mourning, all cannot undertake affairs, use soldiers greatly defeated.
translations.idiomatic: When fire unites with water it is Cui, when it unites with metal it is Shuo, being mourning; all cannot undertake affairs, using soldiers brings great defeat.

translations.literal: Earth is worry, governs evil ministers;
translations.idiomatic: Earth is worry, governing evil ministers;

sentences.zh: 大饑，戰敗，為北軍，軍困，舉事大敗。

translations.literal: Great famine, battle defeated, is north army, army distressed, undertake affairs greatly defeated.
translations.idiomatic: Great famine, battle defeated, being the north army, army distressed, undertaking affairs brings great defeat.

sentences.zh: 土與水合，穰而擁閼，有覆軍，其國不可舉事。

translations.literal: Earth with water unites, abundant yet crowded blocked, has army overturned, its state cannot undertake affairs.
translations.idiomatic: When earth unites with water, abundant yet crowded and blocked, there is an overturned army; its state cannot undertake affairs.

translations.literal: Appears, perishes land;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears, land perishes;

translations.literal: Enters, obtains land.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters, obtains land.

translations.literal: Metal is illness, is inner soldiers, perishes land.
translations.idiomatic: Metal is illness, is inner soldiers, land perishes.

sentences.zh: 三星若合，其宿地國外內有兵與喪，改立公王。

translations.literal: Three stars if unite, its lodge ground state outside inside has soldiers with mourning, changes establishes duke king.
translations.idiomatic: When three stars unite, its lodge ground state's outside and inside has soldiers and mourning, changes and establishes a duke or king.

sentences.zh: 四星合，兵喪并起，君子憂，小人流。

translations.literal: Four stars unite, soldiers mourning together rise, gentleman worry, small man flows.
translations.idiomatic: When four stars unite, soldiers and mourning together rise, gentlemen worry, small men flow.

sentences.zh: 五星合，是為易行，有德，受慶，改立大人，掩有四方，子孫蕃昌；

translations.literal: Five stars unite, this is easy movement, has virtue, receives celebration, changes establishes great man, covers has four directions, children grandchildren numerous prosperous;
translations.idiomatic: When five stars unite, this is easy movement; having virtue, receives celebration, changes and establishes a great man, covers and has the four directions, children and grandchildren numerous and prosperous;

translations.literal: No virtue, receives calamity if perishes.
translations.idiomatic: Without virtue, receives calamity or perishes.

translations.literal: Five stars all big, its affairs also big;
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars are all big, its affairs are also big;

translations.literal: All small, affairs also small.
translations.idiomatic: When all small, affairs are also small.

translations.literal: Early appear ones are surplus, surplus ones are guest.
translations.idiomatic: Those that appear early are surplus, surplus ones are the guest.

sentences.zh: 晚出者為縮，縮者為主人。

translations.literal: Late appear ones are contraction, contraction ones are master.
translations.idiomatic: Those that appear late are contraction, contraction ones are the master.

translations.literal: Must have heaven response seen at dipper ladle star.
translations.idiomatic: There must be a heaven response seen in the dipper ladle star.

translations.literal: Same lodge is union.
translations.idiomatic: Same lodge is union.

sentences.zh: 相陵為斗，七寸以內必之矣。

translations.literal: Mutually oppress is fight, seven inches within must it矣.
translations.idiomatic: Mutually oppressing is fighting; within seven inches it must happen.

translations.literal: Five stars color white round, is mourning drought;
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars' color is white and round, it is mourning and drought;

translations.literal: Red round, then middle not level, is soldiers;
translations.idiomatic: When red and round, then the middle is not level, it is soldiers;

translations.literal: Blue round, is worry water;
translations.idiomatic: When blue and round, it is worry and water;

translations.literal: Black round, is illness, many die;
translations.idiomatic: When black and round, it is illness, many die;

translations.literal: Yellow round, then auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When yellow and round, then auspicious.

sentences.zh: 赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角哭泣之聲，青角有兵憂，黑角則水。

translations.literal: Red horn offends my city, yellow horn land dispute, white horn weeping sound, blue horn has soldiers worry, black horn then water.
translations.idiomatic: When red horn offends my city, yellow horn brings land dispute, white horn brings weeping sound, blue horn has soldiers worry, black horn then water.

translations.literal: Intention, moves exhausted soldiers what ends.
translations.idiomatic: Intention, where exhausted soldiers' movements end.

sentences.zh: 五星同色，天下偃兵，百姓寧昌。

translations.literal: Five stars same color, all under heaven rests soldiers, hundred surnames peaceful prosperous.
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars are the same color, all under heaven rests soldiers, the hundred surnames are peaceful and prosperous.

sentences.zh: 春風秋雨，冬寒夏暑，動搖常以此。

translations.literal: Spring wind autumn rain, winter cold summer heat, move shake constantly with this.
translations.idiomatic: Spring wind, autumn rain, winter cold, summer heat - moving and shaking constantly with this.

sentences.zh: 填星出百二十日而逆西行，西行百二十日反東行。

translations.literal: Tian star appears one hundred twenty days then inverse west moves, west moves one hundred twenty days reverses east moves.
translations.idiomatic: The Tian star appears for one hundred twenty days then moves inversely west, moves west for one hundred twenty days then reverses and moves east.

sentences.zh: 見三百三十日而入，入三十日復出東方。

translations.literal: Seen three hundred thirty days then enters, enters thirty days again appears eastern.
translations.idiomatic: Seen for three hundred thirty days then enters, enters for thirty days then again appears in the east.

sentences.zh: 太歲在甲寅，鎮星在東壁，故在營室。

translations.literal: Great year in jia yin, zhen star in east wall, therefore in camp room.
translations.idiomatic: When the great year is in Jia Yin, the Zhen star is in the east wall, therefore it is in the camp room.

translations.literal: Observe sun movement to place position tai bai.
translations.idiomatic: Observe the sun's movement to place the position of Tai Bai.

sentences.zh: 曰西方，秋，（司兵月行及天矢）日庚、辛，主殺。

translations.literal: Called western, autumn, (governs soldiers moon moves reaches heaven arrow) days geng, xin, governs killing.
translations.idiomatic: It is called western, autumn, (governs soldiers, moon moves and reaches the heaven arrow) days Geng and Xin, governs killing.

translations.literal: Killing lost ones, punishment appears tai bai.
translations.idiomatic: Those who lose killing, punishment appears in Tai Bai.

translations.literal: Tai bai loses movement, with its lodges names states.
translations.idiomatic: When Tai Bai loses its movement, it names the states according to its lodges.

sentences.zh: 其出行十八舍二百四十日而入。

translations.literal: Its travel appears eighteen lodges two hundred forty days then enters.
translations.idiomatic: Its travel appears for eighteen lodges and two hundred forty days then enters.

sentences.zh: 入東方，伏行十一舍百三十日；

translations.literal: Enters eastern, hidden moves eleven lodges one hundred thirty days;
translations.idiomatic: Enters the east, moves hidden for eleven lodges and one hundred thirty days;

sentences.zh: 其入西方，伏行三舍十六日而出。

translations.literal: Its enters western, hidden moves three lodges sixteen days then appears.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters the west, it moves hidden for three lodges and sixteen days then appears.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，當入不入，是謂失舍，不有破軍，必有國君之篡。

translations.literal: Should appear not appear, should enter not enter, this called lost lodge, not have broken army, must have state ruler usurpation.
translations.idiomatic: When it should appear but does not appear, should enter but does not enter, this is called lost lodge; if not a broken army, then there must be the state ruler's usurpation.

sentences.zh: 其紀上元，以攝提格之歲，與營室晨出東方，至角而入；

translations.literal: Its records upper origin, with sheti ge year, with camp room morning appears eastern, reaches horn then enters;
translations.idiomatic: Its records the upper origin, in the Sheti Ge year, appears in the morning with the camp room in the east, reaches the horn then enters;

sentences.zh: 與營室夕出西方，至角而入；

translations.literal: With camp room evening appears western, reaches horn then enters;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the evening with the camp room in the west, reaches the horn then enters;

translations.literal: With horn morning appears, enters bi;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the morning with the horn, enters Bi;

translations.literal: With horn evening appears, enters bi;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the evening with the horn, enters Bi;

translations.literal: With bi morning appears, enters ji;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the morning with Bi, enters Ji;

translations.literal: With bi evening appears, enters ji;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the evening with Bi, enters Ji;

translations.literal: With ji morning appears, enters liu;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the morning with Ji, enters Liu;

translations.literal: With ji evening appears, enters liu;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the evening with Ji, enters Liu;

translations.literal: With liu morning appears, enters camp room;
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the morning with Liu, enters the camp room;

translations.literal: With liu evening appears, enters camp room.
translations.idiomatic: Appears in the evening with Liu, enters the camp room.

sentences.zh: 凡出入東西各五，為八歲，二百二十日，復與營室晨出東方。

translations.literal: Altogether enters exits east west each five, is eight years, two hundred twenty days, again with camp room morning appears eastern.
translations.idiomatic: Altogether entering and exiting east and west five times each, is eight years and two hundred twenty days, then again appears in the morning with the camp room in the east.

translations.literal: Its great rate, year one cycles heaven.
translations.idiomatic: Its great rate is one cycle of heaven per year.

sentences.zh: 其始出東方，行遲，率日半度，一百二十日，必逆行一二舍；

translations.literal: Its begins appear eastern, moves slow, rate daily half degree, one hundred twenty days, must inverse moves one two lodges;
translations.idiomatic: When it first appears in the east, it moves slowly, at a rate of half a degree per day, for one hundred twenty days, it must move inversely one or two lodges;

sentences.zh: 上極而反，東行，行日一度半，一百二十日入。

translations.literal: Reaches pole then reverses, east moves, moves daily one degree half, one hundred twenty days enters.
translations.idiomatic: Reaches the pole then reverses, moves east, moves one and a half degrees daily, enters after one hundred twenty days.

translations.literal: Its low, near sun, called morning star, gentle;
translations.idiomatic: When low and near the sun, it is called the morning star, gentle;

translations.literal: High, far sun, called great xiao, firm.
translations.idiomatic: When high and far from the sun, it is called the great xiao, firm.

sentences.zh: 其始出西［方］，行疾，率日一度半，百二十日；

translations.literal: Its begins appear west [direction], moves fast, rate daily one degree half, one hundred twenty days;
translations.idiomatic: When it first appears in the west, it moves fast, at a rate of one and a half degrees daily, for one hundred twenty days;

sentences.zh: 上極而行遲，日半度，百二十日，旦入，必逆行一二舍而入。

translations.literal: Reaches pole then moves slow, daily half degree, one hundred twenty days, dawn enters, must inverse moves one two lodges then enters.
translations.idiomatic: Reaches the pole then moves slowly, half a degree daily, after one hundred twenty days enters at dawn, must move inversely one or two lodges then enters.

translations.literal: Its low, near sun, called great white, gentle;
translations.idiomatic: When low and near the sun, it is called the great white, gentle;

translations.literal: High, far sun, called great xiang, firm.
translations.idiomatic: When high and far from the sun, it is called the great xiang, firm.

translations.literal: Appears with chen, xu, enters with chou, wei.
translations.idiomatic: Appears with Chen and Xu, enters with Chou and Wei.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，未當入而入，天下偃兵，兵在外，入。

translations.literal: Should appear not appear, not yet should enter yet enters, all under heaven rests soldiers, soldiers outside, enter.
translations.idiomatic: When it should appear but does not appear, when it should not yet enter but enters, all under heaven rests soldiers; soldiers are outside, enter.

sentences.zh: 未當出而出，當入而不入，［天］下起兵，有破國。

translations.literal: Not yet should appear yet appears, should enter not enter, [heaven] below rises soldiers, has broken state.
translations.idiomatic: When it should not yet appear but appears, should enter but does not enter, below rises soldiers, has a broken state.

translations.literal: Its should period appear also, its state prosperous.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in its proper period, its state prospers.

sentences.zh: 其出東為東，入東為北方；

translations.literal: Its appear east is east, enter east is northern;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the east it is eastern, when it enters in the east it is northern;

translations.literal: Appear west is west, enter west is southern.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the west it is western, when it enters in the west it is southern.

translations.literal: What dwells long, its region beneficial;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells long, its region benefits;

translations.literal: (Fast) [easy], its region inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When easy, its region is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 出西（逆行）至東，正西國吉。

translations.literal: Appear west (inverse moves) reaches east, correct west states auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the west and reaches the east, the correct western states are auspicious.

translations.literal: Appear east reaches west, correct east states auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the east and reaches the west, the correct eastern states are auspicious.

translations.literal: Its appear not passes heaven;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears it does not pass through heaven;

translations.literal: Passes heaven, all under heaven changes government.
translations.idiomatic: When it passes through heaven, all under heaven changes government.

translations.literal: Small with horns move, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When small and the horns move, soldiers rise.

translations.literal: Begins appear big, later small, soldiers weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it first appears big then later small, soldiers are weak;

translations.literal: Appear small, later big, soldiers strong.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears small then later big, soldiers are strong.

translations.literal: Appear high, use soldiers deep auspicious, shallow inauspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears high, using soldiers deeply is auspicious, shallowly inauspicious;

translations.literal: Low, shallow auspicious, deep inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When low, shallow is auspicious, deep is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 日方南金居其南，日方北金居其北，曰贏，侯王不寧，用兵進吉退凶。

translations.literal: Sun facing south metal dwells its south, sun facing north metal dwells its north, called surplus, marquises kings not peaceful, use soldiers advance auspicious retreat inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When the sun faces south and metal dwells to its south, when the sun faces north and metal dwells to its north, it is called surplus; marquises and kings are not peaceful, using soldiers to advance is auspicious, retreat inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 日方南金居其北，日方北金居其南，曰縮，侯王有憂，用兵退吉進凶。

translations.literal: Sun facing south metal dwells its north, sun facing north metal dwells its south, called contraction, marquises kings have worry, use soldiers retreat auspicious advance inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When the sun faces south and metal dwells to its north, when the sun faces north and metal dwells to its south, it is called contraction; marquises and kings have worry, using soldiers to retreat is auspicious, advance inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 用兵象太白：太白行疾，疾行；

translations.literal: Use soldiers imitate tai bai: tai bai moves fast, fast move;
translations.idiomatic: Using soldiers imitate Tai Bai: when Tai Bai moves fast, move fast;

translations.literal: Slow, slow move.
translations.idiomatic: When slow, move slow.

translations.literal: Horns, dare battle.
translations.idiomatic: When horns, dare to battle.

translations.literal: Move shake restless, restless.
translations.idiomatic: When it moves and shakes restlessly, it is restless.

translations.literal: Round with quiet, quiet.
translations.idiomatic: When round and quiet, it is quiet.

translations.literal: Comply horns pointed to, auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When complying with where the horns point, auspicious;

translations.literal: Oppose it, all inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When opposing it, all inauspicious.

translations.literal: Appear then send out soldiers, enter then bring in soldiers.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears then send out soldiers, when it enters then bring in soldiers.

translations.literal: Red horns, have battle;
translations.idiomatic: Red horns, have battle;

translations.literal: White horns, have mourning;
translations.idiomatic: White horns, have mourning;

translations.literal: Black round horns, worry, have water affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Black round horns, worry, have water affairs;

translations.literal: Blue round small horns, worry, have wood affairs;
translations.idiomatic: Blue round small horns, worry, have wood affairs;

translations.literal: Yellow round harmonious horns, have earth affairs, have year.
translations.idiomatic: Yellow round harmonious horns, have earth affairs, have a good year.

sentences.zh: 其已出三日而復，有微入，入三日乃復盛出，是謂耎，其下國有軍敗將北。

translations.literal: Its already appear three days then again, has slight enter, enter three days then again flourishing appear, this called soft, its below states have army defeated general north.
translations.idiomatic: When it has already appeared for three days then appears again, has a slight entering, enters for three days then appears flourishing again, this is called soft; its below states have army defeated, general flees north.

sentences.zh: 其已入三日又復微出，出三日而復盛入，其下國有憂；

translations.literal: Its already enter three days again then slight appear, appear three days then again flourishing enter, its below states have worry;
translations.idiomatic: When it has already entered for three days then appears slightly again, appears for three days then enters flourishing again, its below states have worry;

sentences.zh: 師有糧食兵革，遺人用之；

translations.literal: Troops have grain food weapons armor, leave people use them;
translations.idiomatic: Troops have grain, food, weapons, and armor left for people to use;

translations.literal: Soldiers though numerous, general becomes person captive.
translations.idiomatic: Though soldiers are numerous, the general becomes a captive.

translations.literal: Its appear west loses movement, outer states defeated;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the west and loses its movement, outer states are defeated;

translations.literal: Its appear east loses movement, central states defeated.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the east and loses its movement, the central states are defeated.

sentences.zh: 其色大圜黃滜，可為好事；

translations.literal: Its color big round yellow bright, can do good affairs;
translations.idiomatic: When its color is big round yellow bright, it can do good affairs;

translations.literal: Its round big red, soldiers flourish not battle.
translations.idiomatic: When round and big red, soldiers flourish but do not battle.

translations.literal: Tai bai white, compares wolf;
translations.idiomatic: When Tai Bai is white, it compares to the wolf;

translations.literal: Red, compares xin;
translations.idiomatic: Red, compares to Xin;

translations.literal: Yellow, compares shen left shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: Yellow, compares to Shen's left shoulder;

translations.literal: Azure, compares shen right shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: Azure, compares to Shen's right shoulder;

translations.literal: Black, compares kui big star.
translations.idiomatic: Black, compares to Kui's big star.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從太白而聚乎一舍，其下之國可以兵從天下。

translations.literal: Five stars all follow tai bai and gather at one lodge, its below states can with soldiers follow all under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars all follow Tai Bai and gather at one lodge, its below states can with soldiers follow all under heaven.

translations.literal: Dwells solid, has gain also;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells solidly, there is gain;

translations.literal: Dwells empty, no gain also.
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells emptily, there is no gain.

sentences.zh: 行勝色，色勝位，有位勝無位，有色勝無色，行得盡勝之。

translations.literal: Movement overcomes color, color overcomes position, having position overcomes no position, having color overcomes no color, movement can completely overcome them.
translations.idiomatic: Movement overcomes color, color overcomes position; having position overcomes not having position, having color overcomes not having color; movement can completely overcome them.

sentences.zh: 出而留桑榆閒，疾其下國。

translations.literal: Appear and stay mulberry elm between, harms its below states.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears and stays between the mulberry and elm, it harms its below states.

sentences.zh: 上而疾，未盡其日，過參天，疾其對國。

translations.literal: Rises and fast, not complete its days, passes shen heaven, harms its opposing states.
translations.idiomatic: When it rises and is fast, not completing its days, passes through Shen's heaven, harms its opposing states.

translations.literal: Rises then descends, descends then rises, has rebellious general.
translations.idiomatic: When it rises then descends, descends then rises, there is a rebellious general.

translations.literal: Its enters moon, general executed.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters the moon, the general is executed.

sentences.zh: 金、木星合，光，其下戰不合，兵雖起而不鬬；

translations.literal: Metal, wood stars unite, light, its below battle not unite, soldiers though rise yet not fight;
translations.idiomatic: When metal and wood stars unite with light, its below battle does not unite; soldiers though they rise do not fight;

translations.literal: Unite mutually destroy, fields have broken army.
translations.idiomatic: When they unite and mutually destroy, the fields have a broken army.

sentences.zh: 出西方，昏而出陰，陰兵彊；

translations.literal: Appear western, dusk appears yin, yin soldiers strong;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears in the west, appears at dusk as yin, yin soldiers are strong;

translations.literal: Evening eat appears, small weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears at evening meal, small weak;

translations.literal: Midnight appears, middle weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears at midnight, middle weak;

sentences.zh: 雞鳴出，大弱：是謂陰陷於陽。
