translations.literal: Cock crow appears, big weak: this called yin trapped in yang.

sentences.zh: 行南北河，以陰陽言，旱水兵喪。

translations.literal: Moves north south rivers, with yin yang speak, drought water soldiers mourning.
translations.idiomatic: When moves north and south rivers, speaking in terms of yin and yang: drought, floods, soldiers, mourning.

sentences.zh: 月蝕歲星，其宿地，饑若亡。

translations.literal: Moon eclipses year star, its lodge ground, famine if perishes.
translations.idiomatic: When moon eclipses year star, its lodge ground has famine or perishes.

sentences.zh: 熒惑也亂，填星也下犯上，太白也彊國以戰敗，辰星也女亂。

translations.literal: Ying huo also chaos, tian star also below offends above, tai bai also strong state with battle defeated, chen star also woman chaos.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Huo brings chaos, Tian Star brings below offending above, Tai Bai brings strong states to be defeated in battle, Chen Star brings woman chaos.

translations.literal: (Eclipse) [eclipses] great horn, governs fate ones hate it;
translations.idiomatic: (Eclipse) eclipses great horn, those who govern fate hate it;

translations.literal: Xin, then is inner bandit chaos also;
translations.idiomatic: Xin, then is inner bandit chaos;

translations.literal: Arranged stars, its lodge ground worry.
translations.idiomatic: Arranged stars, its lodge ground has worry.

sentences.zh: 月食始日，五月者六，六月者五，五月復六，六月者一，而五月者五，凡百一十三月而復始。

translations.literal: Moon eclipse begins day, fifth month ones six, sixth month ones five, fifth month again six, sixth month ones one, yet fifth month ones five, altogether one hundred thirteen months then again begins.
translations.idiomatic: Moon eclipse begins on day: fifth month has six, sixth month has five, fifth month again has six, sixth month has one, yet fifth month has five; altogether one hundred thirteen months then begins again.

translations.literal: Therefore moon eclipse, constant also;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore moon eclipse is normal;

translations.literal: Sun eclipse, is not good also.
translations.idiomatic: Sun eclipse is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 甲、乙，四海之外，日月不占。

translations.literal: Jia, yi, four seas outside, sun moon not divine.
translations.idiomatic: Jia and yi, beyond the four seas, sun and moon are not divined.

translations.literal: Bing, ding, Jiang, Huai, Hai Dai also.
translations.idiomatic: Bing and ding are Jiang, Huai, Hai, and Dai.

translations.literal: Wu, ji, central state, He, Ji also.
translations.idiomatic: Wu and ji are central state, He, and Ji.

translations.literal: Geng, xin, Hua mountain with west.
translations.idiomatic: Geng and xin are west of Hua Mountain.

translations.literal: Ren, gui, Heng mountain with north.
translations.idiomatic: Ren and gui are north of Heng Mountain.

translations.literal: Sun eclipse, state lord;
translations.idiomatic: Sun eclipse concerns the state lord;

translations.literal: Moon eclipse, generals correspond to it.
translations.idiomatic: Moon eclipse concerns the generals.

sentences.zh: 昭明星，大而白，無角，乍上乍下。

translations.literal: Bright star, large and white, no horns, suddenly up suddenly down.
translations.idiomatic: The bright star is large and white, without horns, suddenly rising then falling.

translations.literal: Its appear country, rises soldiers, many changes.
translations.idiomatic: The country where it appears will raise troops and have many changes.

sentences.zh: 五殘星，出正東東方之野。

translations.literal: Five remnant stars, appear straight east eastern wild.
translations.idiomatic: The five remnant stars appear in the east of the eastern wilds.

sentences.zh: 其星狀類辰星，去地可六丈。

translations.literal: Its star shape like Chen star, leaves ground about six zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Its star shape resembles the Chen star, about six zhang above the ground.

sentences.zh: 大賊星，出正南南方之野。

translations.literal: Great bandit star, appears straight south southern wild.
translations.idiomatic: The great bandit star appears in the south of the southern wilds.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，有光。

translations.literal: Star leaves ground about six zhang, large and red, frequently moves, has light.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang above the ground, large and red, frequently moving, and has light.

sentences.zh: 司危星，出正西西方之野。

translations.literal: Supervisor danger star, appears straight west western wild.
translations.idiomatic: The supervisor danger star appears in the west of the western wilds.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而白，類太白。

translations.literal: Star leaves ground about six zhang, large and white, resembles Tai Bai.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang above the ground, large and white, resembling Tai Bai.

sentences.zh: 獄漢星，出正北北方之野。

translations.literal: Prison Han star, appears straight north northern wild.
translations.idiomatic: The prison Han star appears in the north of the northern wilds.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，察之中青。

translations.literal: Star leaves ground about six zhang, large and red, frequently moves, observes within it green.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang above the ground, large and red, frequently moving, with green observed within it.

sentences.zh: 此四野星所出，出非其方，其下有兵，沖不利。

translations.literal: These four wild stars their appear, appear not their direction, their below has soldiers, charge inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When these four wild stars appear, if they appear not in their direction, below them there are soldiers, charging is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 四填星，所出四隅，去地可四丈。

translations.literal: Four Tian stars, their appear four corners, leaves ground about four zhang.
translations.idiomatic: The four Tian stars appear in the four corners, about four zhang above the ground.

sentences.zh: 地維咸光，亦出四隅，去地可三丈，若月始出。

translations.literal: Earth dimension salty light, also appears four corners, leaves ground about three zhang, like moon begins appear.
translations.idiomatic: The earth dimension salty light also appears in the four corners, about three zhang above the ground, like when the moon first appears.

translations.literal: Its seen, below has chaos;
translations.idiomatic: Where seen, below has chaos;

translations.literal: Chaos ones perish, have virtue ones prosper.
translations.idiomatic: Those in chaos perish, those with virtue prosper.

sentences.zh: 燭星，狀如太白，其出也不行。

translations.literal: Candle star, shape like Tai Bai, its appear also not moves.
translations.idiomatic: The candle star is shaped like Tai Bai, when it appears it does not move.

translations.literal: Seen then extinguishes.
translations.idiomatic: When seen, then extinguishes.

translations.literal: Its illuminates ones, city settlements chaos.
translations.idiomatic: What it illuminates, city and settlements have chaos.

sentences.zh: 如星非星，如雲非雲，命曰歸邪。

translations.literal: Like star not star, like cloud not cloud, names called return evil.
translations.idiomatic: Like a star but not a star, like a cloud but not a cloud, called the return evil.

translations.literal: Return evil appears, certainly has return country ones.
translations.idiomatic: When the return evil appears, there certainly are those who return to their countries.

sentences.zh: 星者，金之散氣，［其］本曰火。

translations.literal: Stars are, metal's scattered qi, [its] root called fire.
translations.idiomatic: Stars are metal's scattered qi, their root is called fire.

translations.literal: Stars numerous, country auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When stars are numerous, the country is auspicious;

translations.literal: Few then ominous.
translations.idiomatic: If few, then ominous.

sentences.zh: 漢者，亦金之散氣，其本曰水。

translations.literal: Han is, also metal's scattered qi, its root called water.
translations.idiomatic: The Han is also metal's scattered qi, its root is called water.

sentences.zh: 漢，星多，多水，少則旱，其大經也。

translations.literal: Han, stars many, many water, few then drought, its great constant also.
translations.idiomatic: The Han: when stars are many, there are many floods; when few, then drought—this is its great constant.

sentences.zh: 天鼓，有音如雷非雷，音在地而下及地。

translations.literal: Heaven drum, has sound like thunder not thunder, sound in ground yet down reaches ground.
translations.idiomatic: The heaven drum has a sound like thunder but not thunder, the sound is in the ground yet reaches down to the ground.

translations.literal: Its goes to ones, soldiers rise their below.
translations.idiomatic: Where it goes, soldiers rise below it.

sentences.zh: 天狗，狀如大奔星，有聲，其下止地，類狗。

translations.literal: Heaven dog, shape like great run star, has sound, its below stops ground, resembles dog.
translations.idiomatic: The heaven dog is shaped like a great running star, has sound, stops below on the ground, resembling a dog.

sentences.zh: 所墮及，望之如火光炎炎沖天。

translations.literal: Its falls reaches, looks at it like fire light blazing rushes heaven.
translations.idiomatic: Where it falls and reaches, when viewed it is like blazing fire light rushing to heaven.

sentences.zh: 其下圜如數頃田處，上兌者則有黃色，千里破軍殺將。

translations.literal: Its below round like several qing field place, above broken ones then has yellow color, thousand li breaks army kills general.
translations.idiomatic: Below it is round like several qing of field, where above is broken there is yellow color, within a thousand li breaks armies and kills generals.

translations.literal: Ge Ze star is, like blazing fire's shape.
translations.idiomatic: The Ge Ze star is like the shape of blazing fire.

translations.literal: Yellow white, rises ground and up.
translations.idiomatic: Yellow and white, rises from the ground upward.

translations.literal: Below large, above broken.
translations.idiomatic: Below is large, above is broken.

translations.literal: Its seen also, not plant yet harvest;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears, without planting one harvests;

translations.literal: Not has earth works, certainly has great harm.
translations.idiomatic: If there are no earth works, there certainly is great harm.

sentences.zh: 蚩尤之旗，類彗而後曲，象旗。

translations.literal: Chi You's banner, resembles comet yet back curved, imitates banner.
translations.idiomatic: Chi You's banner resembles a comet but is curved behind, imitating a banner.

translations.literal: Seen then king ones campaign conquer four directions.
translations.idiomatic: When seen, then kings campaign and conquer the four directions.

sentences.zh: 旬始，出於北斗旁，狀如雄雞。

translations.literal: Decade begins, appears at north dipper side, shape like male chicken.
translations.idiomatic: The decade begins, appears beside the northern dipper, shaped like a male chicken.

translations.literal: Its anger, blue-black, imitates crouching turtle.
translations.idiomatic: When angry, blue-black, imitating a crouching turtle.

sentences.zh: 枉矢，類大流星，蛇行而倉黑，望之如有毛羽然。

translations.literal: Bent arrow, resembles great shooting star, snake moves yet granary black, looks at it like has hair feathers thus.
translations.idiomatic: The bent arrow resembles a great shooting star, moves like a snake yet is granary black, when viewed it seems to have hair and feathers.

translations.literal: Long Geng, like one bolt cloth covering heaven.
translations.idiomatic: The long Geng is like a bolt of cloth covering the heavens.

translations.literal: This star seen, soldiers rise.
translations.idiomatic: When this star appears, soldiers rise.

translations.literal: Star falls to ground, then stone also.
translations.idiomatic: When a star falls to the ground, it is then a stone.

translations.literal: He, Ji between, time has falling stars.
translations.idiomatic: Between the He and Ji, there are sometimes falling stars.

translations.literal: Heaven essence and sees Jing star.
translations.idiomatic: When heaven's essence, then the Jing star appears.

translations.literal: Jing star is, virtue star also.
translations.idiomatic: The Jing star is a virtue star.

sentences.zh: 其狀無常，常出於有道之國。

translations.literal: Its shape no constant, constantly appears at has way states.
translations.idiomatic: Its shape has no constant, it constantly appears in states that have the Way.

sentences.zh: 凡望雲氣，仰而望之，三四百里；

translations.literal: All observe cloud qi, raise head and observe it, three four hundred li;
translations.idiomatic: When observing cloud qi in general, look up and observe it, three to four hundred li;

sentences.zh: 平望，在桑榆上，千餘［里］二千里；

translations.literal: Level observe, at mulberry elm above, thousand remaining [li] two thousand li;
translations.idiomatic: When observing level, above the mulberry and elm, one thousand to two thousand li;

sentences.zh: 登高而望之，下屬地者三千里。

translations.literal: Climb high and observe it, below connects ground ones three thousand li.
translations.idiomatic: When climbing high to observe it, those connecting below to the ground are three thousand li.

translations.literal: Cloud qi has beast dwells above ones, victorious.
translations.idiomatic: Cloud qi where beasts dwell above them are victorious.

translations.literal: From Hua south, qi below black above red.
translations.idiomatic: South of Hua Mountain, the qi is black below and red above.

translations.literal: Song high, three river outskirts, qi exactly red.
translations.idiomatic: In the outskirts of Song Mountain and the three rivers, the qi is exactly red.

translations.literal: Heng mountain north, qi below black below blue.
translations.idiomatic: North of Heng Mountain, the qi is black below and blue below.

translations.literal: Bo, Jie, Hai, Dai between, qi all black.
translations.idiomatic: Between Bo, Jie, Hai, and Dai, the qi are all black.

translations.literal: Jiang, Huai between, qi all white.
translations.idiomatic: Between Jiang and Huai, the qi are all white.

translations.literal: Foot soldier qi white.
translations.idiomatic: Foot soldier qi is white.

translations.literal: Earth works qi yellow.
translations.idiomatic: Earth works qi is yellow.

sentences.zh: 車氣乍高乍下，往往而聚。

translations.literal: Chariot qi suddenly high suddenly low, here there and gather.
translations.idiomatic: Chariot qi suddenly rises and falls, gathering here and there.

translations.literal: Cavalry qi low and spread.
translations.idiomatic: Cavalry qi is low and spread out.

translations.literal: Soldier qi coiled.
translations.idiomatic: Soldier qi is coiled.

translations.literal: Front low yet back high ones, fast;
translations.idiomatic: Those with front low but back high are fast;

translations.literal: Front broken yet back high ones, joyful;
translations.idiomatic: Those with front broken but back high are joyful;

translations.literal: Back broken yet low ones, retreat.
translations.idiomatic: Those with back broken and low retreat.

translations.literal: Its qi level ones its movement slow.
translations.idiomatic: Those whose qi is level, their movement is slow.

sentences.zh: 前高而後卑者，不止而反。

translations.literal: Front high yet back low ones, not stop yet return.
translations.idiomatic: Those with front high but back low do not stop but return.

sentences.zh: 氣相遇者，卑勝高，兌勝方。

translations.literal: Qi meet each other ones, low victorious high, joyful victorious square.
translations.idiomatic: When qi meet each other, the low defeats the high, the joyful defeats the square.

sentences.zh: 氣來卑而循車通者，不過三四日，去之五六里見。

translations.literal: Qi comes low yet follows chariot road ones, not exceed three four days, leaves it five six li seen.
translations.idiomatic: Qi that comes low and follows chariot roads will arrive within three to four days, visible from five to six li away.

sentences.zh: 氣來高七八尺者，不過五六日，去之十餘里見。

translations.literal: Qi comes high seven eight chi ones, not exceed five six days, leaves it ten remaining li seen.
translations.idiomatic: Qi that comes seven to eight chi high will arrive within five to six days, visible from ten or more li away.

sentences.zh: 氣來高丈餘二丈者，不過三四十日，去之五六十里見。

translations.literal: Qi comes high zhang remaining two zhang ones, not exceed thirty forty days, leaves it fifty sixty li seen.
translations.idiomatic: Qi that comes more than a zhang to two zhang high will arrive within thirty to forty days, visible from fifty to sixty li away.

sentences.zh: 稍云精白者，其將悍，其士怯。

translations.literal: Slight cloud essence white ones, its generals fierce, its soldiers cowardly.
translations.idiomatic: Slight clouds that are pure white indicate fierce generals but cowardly soldiers.

sentences.zh: 其大根而前絕遠者，當戰。

translations.literal: Its large root yet front cut off far ones, should battle.
translations.idiomatic: Those with large roots but fronts cut off far away should do battle.

translations.literal: Blue white, its front low ones, battle victorious;
translations.idiomatic: Blue-white qi with low fronts will win battles;

translations.literal: Its front red yet upturned ones, battle not victorious.
translations.idiomatic: Those with red fronts that are upturned will not win battles.

translations.literal: Battle formation cloud like standing wall.
translations.idiomatic: Battle formation clouds are like standing walls.

translations.literal: Shuttle cloud resembles shuttle.
translations.idiomatic: Shuttle clouds resemble shuttles.

translations.literal: Axle cloud coiled both ends joyful.
translations.idiomatic: Axle clouds are coiled with joyful ends.

sentences.zh: 杓雲如繩者，居前亙天，其半半天。

translations.literal: Dipper cloud like rope ones, dwells front spans heaven, its half half heaven.
translations.idiomatic: Dipper clouds that are like ropes dwell in front spanning heaven, half of them half the sky.

translations.literal: Its winding ones resemble palace gate banners therefore.
translations.idiomatic: Their winding ones resemble palace gate banners.

translations.literal: Hook cloud bent curved.
translations.idiomatic: Hook clouds are bent and curved.

translations.literal: All these cloud seen, with five colors combine divine.
translations.idiomatic: When all these clouds appear, divine them by combining with the five colors.

sentences.zh: 而澤摶密，其見動人，乃有占；

translations.literal: Yet moisture coiled dense, its appear moves people, then has divination;
translations.idiomatic: When moisture is coiled and dense, its appearance moves people, then there is divination;

translations.literal: Soldiers certainly rise, combine fight its straight.
translations.idiomatic: Soldiers will certainly rise, combining to fight in straight lines.

translations.literal: King beginning month what observe, decides at sun side.
translations.idiomatic: What the king observes at the beginning of the month is decided beside the sun.

translations.literal: Sun side cloud qi, person lord image.
translations.idiomatic: Cloud qi beside the sun are images of the ruler.

translations.literal: All like their shape to divine.
translations.idiomatic: All are divined according to their shapes.

sentences.zh: 故北夷之氣如群畜穹閭，南夷之氣類舟船幡旗。

translations.literal: Therefore north barbarians' qi like herd livestock domed gate, south barbarians' qi resembles boat ships banner flags.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore northern barbarians' qi resembles herds of livestock with domed gates, southern barbarians' qi resembles boats, ships, banners, and flags.

sentences.zh: 大水處，敗軍場，破國之虛，下有積錢，金寶之上，皆有氣，不可不察。

translations.literal: Great water places, defeated army fields, broken states' ruins, below has accumulated money, gold treasures above, all have qi, cannot not observe.
translations.idiomatic: Places of great waters, battlefields of defeated armies, ruins of broken states, below have accumulated money, above gold treasures—all have qi that cannot fail to be observed.

translations.literal: Sea side mirage qi imitates towers terraces;
translations.idiomatic: Qi beside the sea that are mirages imitate towers and terraces;

translations.literal: Broad wilderness qi forms palace halls thus.
translations.idiomatic: Qi in broad wildernesses form palace halls.

sentences.zh: 雲氣各象其山川人民所聚積。

translations.literal: Cloud qi each imitates their mountains rivers people what gathered accumulated.
translations.idiomatic: Cloud qi each imitate their mountains, rivers, and the accumulations where people gather.

sentences.zh: 故候息秏者，入國邑，視封疆田疇之正治，城郭室屋門戶之潤澤，次至車服畜產精華。

translations.literal: Therefore observe flourishing wasting ones, enter state settlements, view borders fields' correct governance, city walls chambers houses gates' moist luster, next to chariots clothing livestock produce essence splendor.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore when observing flourishing or wasting, enter the state's settlements and view the correct governance of borders and fields, the moist luster of city walls, chambers, houses, and gates, next the chariots, clothing, livestock, and produce's essence and splendor.

translations.literal: Solid flourishing ones, auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: Those that are solid and flourishing are auspicious;

translations.literal: Empty wasting ones, ominous.
translations.idiomatic: Those that are empty and wasting are ominous.

sentences.zh: 若煙非煙，若雲非雲，郁郁紛紛，蕭索輪囷，是謂卿雲。

translations.literal: Like smoke not smoke, like cloud not cloud, melancholy confused, desolate round, this called minister cloud.
translations.idiomatic: Like smoke but not smoke, like cloud but not cloud, melancholy and confused, desolate and round—this is called the minister cloud.

translations.literal: Minister cloud [seen], joy qi also.
translations.idiomatic: The minister cloud is joyful qi.

sentences.zh: 若霧非霧，衣冠而不濡，見則其域被甲而趨。

translations.literal: Like fog not fog, clothing caps yet not wet, seen then its region armored yet hasten.
translations.idiomatic: Like fog but not fog, clothing and caps are not wet; when seen, its region arms itself and hastens.

sentences.zh: （天）［夫］雷電、蝦虹、辟歷、夜明者，陽氣之動者也，春夏則發，秋冬則藏，故候者無不司之。

translations.literal: (Heaven) [Indeed] thunder lightning, shrimp rainbow, pi li, night bright ones, yang qi movers also, spring summer then issue, autumn winter then hide, therefore observers none not govern them.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, thunder, lightning, rainbows, pi li, and night brightness are movers of yang qi; they issue in spring and summer, hide in autumn and winter; therefore observers all govern them.

translations.literal: Heaven opens hangs things, earth moves splits breaks.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven opens and hangs things, earth moves and splits and breaks.

translations.literal: Mountains collapse and move, rivers block streams dam;
translations.idiomatic: Mountains collapse and shift, rivers block and streams dam;

sentences.zh: 水澹（澤竭）地長，［澤竭］見象。

translations.literal: Water ripples (marshes dry) earth grows, [marshes dry] sees images.
translations.idiomatic: Water ripples and marshes dry, earth grows; marshes dry and images appear.

sentences.zh: 城郭門閭，閨臬［枯槁］槁枯；

translations.literal: City walls gates doors, chambers owls [withered] withered withered;
translations.idiomatic: City walls, gates, doors, chambers, owls—withered and withered;

translations.literal: Palaces temples mansions residences, people what lodge.
translations.idiomatic: Palaces, temples, mansions, residences—where people lodge.

translations.literal: Songs customs chariots clothing, observe people food drink.
translations.idiomatic: Songs, customs, chariots, clothing—observe the people's food and drink.

translations.literal: Five grains grasses woods, observe their what belongs.
translations.idiomatic: Five grains, grasses, woods—observe what they belong to.

translations.literal: Granaries treasuries stables storehouses, four directions roads.
translations.idiomatic: Granaries, treasuries, stables, storehouses—roads in four directions.

translations.literal: Six domestic animals birds beasts, what produce go stay;
translations.idiomatic: Six domestic animals, birds, beasts—what they produce, go, or stay;

translations.literal: Fish turtles birds rats, observe their what dwell.
translations.idiomatic: Fish, turtles, birds, rats—observe where they dwell.

translations.literal: Ghosts cry like call, their people meet misfortune.
translations.idiomatic: Ghosts cry like calls; their people meet misfortune.

translations.literal: Transformed words, truly thus.
translations.idiomatic: Transformed words are truly so.

translations.literal: All observe year good bad, carefully observe year beginning.
translations.idiomatic: When observing whether the year is good or bad, carefully observe the year's beginning.

sentences.zh: 歲始或冬至日，產氣始萌。

translations.literal: Year beginning or winter solstice day, produce qi begins sprouts.
translations.idiomatic: At the year's beginning or winter solstice day, productive qi begins to sprout.

sentences.zh: 臘明日，人眾卒歲，一會飲食，發陽氣，故曰初歲。

translations.literal: La tomorrow day, people crowd end year, one gather food drink, issue yang qi, therefore called initial year.
translations.idiomatic: On the day after La, people crowd to end the year, gathering once for food and drink, issuing yang qi; therefore it is called the initial year.

translations.literal: First month dawn, king ones year head;
translations.idiomatic: The dawn of the first month is the kings' year beginning;

translations.literal: Establish spring day, four seasons' (end) beginning also.
translations.idiomatic: The day of spring's establishment is the four seasons' beginning.

translations.literal: Four beginnings ones, observe them days.
translations.idiomatic: The four beginnings are the days to observe.

sentences.zh: 而漢魏鮮集臘明正月旦決八風。

translations.literal: Yet Han Wei rarely gather la bright first month dawn decide eight winds.
translations.idiomatic: Yet Han and Wei rarely gathered at la brightness and first month dawn to decide the eight winds.

translations.literal: Wind from south comes, great drought;
translations.idiomatic: When wind comes from the south, great drought;

translations.literal: Southwest, small drought;
translations.idiomatic: Southwest, small drought;

translations.literal: West, has soldiers;
translations.idiomatic: West, has soldiers;

translations.literal: Northwest, Rong bean for, small rain, hasten soldiers;
translations.idiomatic: Northwest, Rong beans become, small rain, hasten soldiers;

translations.literal: North, is middle year;
translations.idiomatic: North, is a middle year;

translations.literal: Northeast, is upper year;
translations.idiomatic: Northeast, is an upper year;

translations.literal: East, great water;
translations.idiomatic: East, great floods;

translations.literal: Southeast, people have diseases epidemics, year bad.
translations.idiomatic: Southeast, the people have diseases and epidemics, the year is bad.

sentences.zh: 故八風各與其沖對，課多者為勝。

sentences.zh: 余觀史記，考行事，百年之中，五星無出而不反逆行，反逆行，嘗盛大而變色；

translations.literal: I observe history records, examine carried affairs, hundred years within, five stars none appear yet not return inverse movement, return inverse movement, often grand great yet change color;
translations.idiomatic: I observe the history records, examine the carried out affairs; within a hundred years, the five stars none appear without return inverse movement; return inverse movement often appears grand and great and changes color;

sentences.zh: 日月薄蝕，行南北有時：此其大度也。

translations.literal: Sun moon thin eclipses, move north south have time: this their great measure also.
translations.idiomatic: Sun and moon thin eclipses, their movement north and south has timing: this is their great measure.

sentences.zh: 故紫宮、房心、權衡、咸池、虛危列宿部星，此天之五官坐位也，為經，不移徙，大小有差，闊狹有常。

translations.literal: Therefore Purple Palace, Fang Xin, Quan Heng, Xian Chi, Xu Wei arranged lodges department stars, this heaven five officials sitting positions also, is warp, not move relocate, size has difference, broad narrow has constant.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore Purple Palace, Fang Xin, Quan Heng, Xian Chi, Xu Wei—the arranged lodges' department stars—these are heaven's five officials' sitting positions, are the warp, do not move or relocate; size has differences, broad and narrow have constants.

sentences.zh: 水、火、金、木、填星，此五星者，天之五佐，為［經］緯，見伏有時，所過行贏縮有度。

translations.literal: Water, fire, metal, wood, fill star, this five stars ones, heaven five assistants, is [warp] weft, appear hide have time, what pass movement surplus contract have measure.
translations.idiomatic: Water, fire, metal, wood, fill star—these five stars—are heaven's five assistants, are the weft; their appearing and hiding has timing, their passed movement's surplus and contract has measure.

sentences.zh: 日變修德，月變省刑，星變結和。

translations.literal: Sun changes cultivate virtue, moon changes examine punishments, stars change bind harmony.
translations.idiomatic: When the sun changes, cultivate virtue; when the moon changes, examine punishments; when stars change, bind harmony.

translations.literal: All heaven changes, exceed measure then divine.
translations.idiomatic: When heaven changes, only when exceeding the measure do we divine.

translations.literal: State lords strong great, have virtue ones prosper;
translations.idiomatic: State lords become strong and great, those with virtue prosper;

translations.literal: Feathers small, adorn deceit ones perish.
translations.idiomatic: Feathers small, those who adorn with deceit perish.

sentences.zh: 太上修德，其次修政，其次修救，其次修禳，正下無之。

translations.literal: Supreme cultivate virtue, next cultivate government, next cultivate relief, next cultivate exorcism, lowest none it.
translations.idiomatic: The supreme cultivate virtue, next cultivate government, next cultivate relief, next cultivate exorcism; the lowest have none of it.

sentences.zh: 夫常星之變希見，而三光之占亟用。

translations.literal: Indeed constant stars changes rare seen, yet three luminaries divination frequent use.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed the constant stars' changes are rarely seen, yet the three luminaries' divination is frequently used.

sentences.zh: 日月暈適，雲風，此天之客氣，其發見亦有大運。

translations.literal: Sun moon halos meet, clouds wind, this heaven guest qi, their issue seen also has great fortune.
translations.idiomatic: Sun and moon halos meeting, clouds and wind—these are heaven's guest qi; their issuing and appearing also have great fortune.

sentences.zh: 然其與政事俯仰，最近（大）［天］人之符。

translations.literal: Yet their with government affairs rise fall, nearest (great) [heaven] person tally.
translations.idiomatic: Yet their relation with government affairs' rise and fall is the nearest heaven-person tally.

translations.literal: This five ones, heaven's movements responses.
translations.idiomatic: These five are heaven's movements and responses.

translations.literal: Be heaven numbers ones, certainly penetrate three five.
translations.idiomatic: Those who serve as heaven's numbers certainly penetrate the three and five.

sentences.zh: 終始古今，深觀時變，察其精粗，則天官備矣。

translations.literal: End begin ancient present, deep observe time changes, observe their essence coarseness, then heaven officials complete indeed.
translations.idiomatic: From end to beginning, ancient to present, deeply observe time's changes, observe their essence and coarseness, then heaven's officials are complete.

translations.literal: Azure Emperor practices virtue, heaven gate for it opens.
translations.idiomatic: When the Azure Emperor practices virtue, the heaven gate opens for it.

translations.literal: Red Emperor practices virtue, heaven prison for it empties.
translations.idiomatic: When the Red Emperor practices virtue, the heaven prison empties for it.

translations.literal: Yellow Emperor practices virtue, heaven young for it rises.
translations.idiomatic: When the Yellow Emperor practices virtue, heaven's young rise for it.

translations.literal: Wind from northwest comes, certainly with Geng, Xin.
translations.idiomatic: When wind comes from the northwest, it certainly brings Geng and Xin.

translations.literal: One autumn within, five arrive, great amnesty;
translations.idiomatic: Within one autumn, five arrive, great amnesty;

translations.literal: Three arrive, small amnesty.
translations.idiomatic: Three arrive, small amnesty.

sentences.zh: 白帝行德，以正月二十日、二十一日，月暈圍，常大赦載，謂有太陽也。

translations.literal: White Emperor practices virtue, with first month twentieth day, twenty first day, moon halo surrounds, constantly great amnesty year, called has great yang also.
translations.idiomatic: When the White Emperor practices virtue, on the twentieth and twenty-first days of the first month, moon halos surround; constantly great amnesty in that year, called having great yang.

sentences.zh: 一曰：白帝行德，畢、昴為之圍。

translations.literal: One says: White Emperor practices virtue, Bi, Mao for it surround.
translations.idiomatic: One says: when the White Emperor practices virtue, Bi and Mao surround for it.

translations.literal: Surround three evenings, virtue then completes;
translations.idiomatic: When surrounded for three evenings, virtue then completes;

sentences.zh: 不三暮，及圍不合，德不成。

translations.literal: Not three evenings, and surround not unite, virtue not complete.
translations.idiomatic: If not three evenings, and the surround does not unite, virtue does not complete.

translations.literal: Two says: with Chen surround, not exit their decade.
translations.idiomatic: Second says: surrounded with Chen, does not exit their decade.

translations.literal: Black Emperor practices virtue, heaven pass for it moves.
translations.idiomatic: When the Black Emperor practices virtue, the heaven pass moves for it.

translations.literal: Heaven practices virtue, Son of Heaven changes establishes year;
translations.idiomatic: When heaven practices virtue, the Son of Heaven changes and establishes the year;

translations.literal: Not virtue, wind rain breaks stone.
translations.idiomatic: Without virtue, wind and rain break stone.

translations.literal: Three abilities, three balances ones, heaven court also.
translations.idiomatic: The three abilities and three balances are the heaven court.

translations.literal: Guest star appears heaven court, has extraordinary command.
translations.idiomatic: When a guest star appears in the heaven court, there is an extraordinary command.
